basics.name: Filip Rajec
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Take a look at my profile online to learn more about me.

work.name: Reusably
work.summary: Negotiating architecture choices and leading the build of an extendable and maintainable SasS product.
highlights: Designing and implementing a Typescript monorepo web/android/iOS SPA wrapped in Ionic Capacitor from ground up.
Implementing a Prisma/tRPC backend, with unit/integration testing, OAuth2 user authentication and RBAC permissions.
Optimizing database queries and implementing table locking for data integrity.
Implementing technologies to build WebSocket, SMTP mail and push notifications, as well as next-generation encrypted NFC writing/reading frameworks.
Deploying and managing servers, CI/CD system, logging and monitoring architecture.
Building a Stripe integration with subscriptions, webhooks and mobile payment methods including google/apple pay.
Navigating app stores, policies and automating submissions using fastlane.
Understanding cybersecurity concerns and conducting an internal pen test at both an organizational and codebase level.
Managing an developer, solving technical problems with the team and presenting to SasS customers.

work.name: GoodHuman
highlights: Building fully-tested customer-first accessible features.
Focused on fulfilling WCAG for all new code.
Uplifting the legacy codebase by strongly typing and refactoring according MVC principles.
Reproducing, fixing and triaging bugs in production and development environments.
Contributing to and running team & company-wide ceremonies, including sprint planning, stand-ups and retrospectives.
Problem solving with product managers/designers on feature development and release timelines.

work.name: Fans Inc
highlights: Designing, building and optimizing GraphQL schemas using DynamoDB (NoSQL) and AWS AppSync.
Designing and building a payment platform leveraging Checkout.com's API with support for offers, auctions and buy-it-now purchases.
Implementing unit and integration tests on backend functions with Jest.
Maintaining good error exception handling practices, with guaranteed success or rollback across services by anticipating edge cases.
Building a Web3 smart contract using Solidity and a custom NFT minting backend using the Polygon blockchain.
Working with an agile workflow via ClickUp.

work.name: Liquid
work.summary: Working closely in a small team to build elegant, modern websites and SasS products.
highlights: Transforming designs into pixel-perfect web experiences using Vue.js.
Thoroughly testing to ensure pages are responsive and accessible across all browsers.
Creating a deployable Docker container incorporating studios' style libraries, Webpack and CraftCMS to speed up the deployment of new projects and save server costs.
Significantly improved the page speed rating of the studio's SasS product and starter template by introducing code-splitting and tree-shaking.

work.name: AthletesAI
work.summary: Adding features to and maintaining a modern web app built on React.js with an agile workflow via Jira.
highlights: Designing and building maintainable React.js components.
Working with the REST API, MySQL, AWS lambda and PayPal integration, and integrating AWS Appsync and Amplify to add modern features such as WebSockets.

work.name: Dingohead Creative
work.summary: Freelancing and consulting with start-ups and non-for-profits to build small web-based projects.

work.name: University of Adelaide
highlights: Led first-year physics and data science tutorials, explaining fundamental techniques using simple mathematical and programming approaches.
Learning how to communicate complex information to diverse audiences.

volunteer.summary: Building/maintaining an online platform that powers matches between refugees and those with spare rooms in the community.

courses: Working with in collaboration to extend a C++ model fitting program.
Carefully documenting my contribution to the codebase and analysing results.
Learning how to scrutinise, debug and carefully test code through stages of its lifecycle to release.
Fundamentals in scientific, mathematical, procedural thinking and computer science.
